english.segment1: i was twenty. and you were thirty two. thank god you had the patience to deal with me. you were my hero. and i was hyperactive. but you didn't seem to mind that much
english.segment2: and it's so often. i think of you. you taught me so much. who will i go to
english.segment3: doctor blue. always true. even if the team lost all year. we dressed like clowns. walked all around. you know that people though we were crazy
english.segment4: i know youre up there. in heaven. one thing i ask of you. is please remember me on the other side
english.segment5: now im twenty seven. and you were thirty eight. thank you for all your time it meant so much to me. i know i bugged you sometimes. thanks for loving me. you seemed to be the only one who understood me
english.segment6: and its so often. i think of you. you taught me so much. who will i go to
english.segment7: doctor blue. always true. even if the team lost all year. we dressed like clowns. walked all around. you know that people though we were crazy
english.segment8: doctor blue. always true. even if the team lost all year. we dressed like clowns. walked all around. you know that people though we were crazy
english.segment9: i know youre up there. in heaven. one thing i ask of you. is please remember me on the other side
